[money origami] if you get this joke...

2004-03-19

スーパー万... then you win! There are some cool other ones as well, click around.

Solution: [万 (said man) means 10,000 in Japanese, so スーパー万 is "super-man" (actually suupaaman, but same idea), and the origami is folded from a 10,000 yen bill... hardy har har]
